subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Clay Buchholz pitched six shutout innings, David Ortiz continued his surge with two doubles and three runs batted in and Julio Lugo went 4 for 4 in the Red Sox’ victory.
snippet: Clay Buchholz pitched six shutout innings, David Ortiz continued his surge with two doubles and three runs batted in and Julio Lugo went 4 for 4 in the Red Sox’ victory.
